pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pyphen is a pure Python module to hyphenate text using existing Hunspellhyphenation dictionaries.This module is a fork of python-hyphenator, written by Wilbert Berendsen.Many dictionaries are included in pyphen, they come from the LibreOffice gitrepository and are distributed under GPL, LGPL and/or MPL. Dictionaries are notmodified in this repository.
